name: Force Update
description:
*iOS - Requires 12.4.0 version or later. Prior versions would not get the force update

Prerequisite - Remote Config Setup: force_update_params
1. Go to Firebase -> Remote Config (links below)
2. Edit "min_app_version" within "force_update_params" as needed to force display. (One way is to set the minimum version to a value greater than current version of BP app installed.)
3. Save changes.
4. Publish changes.

BE CAUTIOUS WHEN UPDATING PROD CONFIGURATION AS CHANGES WOULD BE WITNESSED TO LIVE USER

Remote Configs 
[Ballpark QA App](https://console.firebase.google.com/u/0/project/mlb-mobile-npd/config)
[Ballpark](https://console.firebase.google.com/u/0/project/mlb-ballpark-app-831/config)
(can have condition set up to differentiate desired behavior for different envs/platform)

CONFIGURATION TROUBLESHOOTING NOTES:
*Only change 'min_app_version' to validate Force Upgrade specifically (setting a higher version than current build)
*Format of the version requires release number, major version, and minor version - ex: 12.4.0 (12.4 will not work)
*Verify condition is what is expected (if using condition) - ex: verify 'iOS QA' isn't tied to a specific version of the app that may not apply to version being tested

name: Display
description:
Current Logic:
*Activity can start 2 hours before all the way up to 3 hours after.
*"Auto-dismiss" now only happens when you open the app 3 hours after game start. Otherwise the activity can potentially sit on the user's lock screen for 12 hours after the activity starts. (12 hour time is an Apple limit)

(so would need to change the device date/time to fall in the appropriate window)

**Spring Venues are NOT currently supported for Live Activities feature**
**NonGame Events (Concerts, Tours, Test Events, Etc) are NOT currently supported for Live Activities feature**

name: Onboarding Flow
description:
As a Ballpark user, I want to know the information needed to enter the stadium by facial recognition so that I successfully enrolled in the GoAhead-Entry program.

Android: [BPA-7052](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BPA-7052 )
iOS: [BP-10293](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BP-10293 )
